item.title: A Static site,Hugo and Github
item.description: Chasing the trend of trying to recapture what it was like to publish and do dev in the early 2000’s I’m giving Hugo a try. GitHub pages seems to be the perfect Geocities replacement and thus, this lives here. Right off the bat, things are different. Back in the days, you could conceivably open Notepad, or FrontPage and start building a page. Building in Hugo is not easier or different from any other moderns stack I know.
